::: Set continued to converse and lie to Hell Beast. It was difficult because 
of his diplomatic traing. Set just hoped Hell Beast couldnt detect him lying 
to him. :::

::: Hell Beast ::: A mining operation? Thats what Ive been doing for the past 
year!

::: Set ::: Yes, but we need the energon badly. Our fleets are getting 
dry....the Senate said you were taking to long.

::: Hell Beast ::: Nonsense! I own the Senate! They take there orders from 
me...as dose the TriPredicus Council.

::; Set lughed. He knew that was a flat out lie ::: The TriPredicus Council?! 
Yeah....I bet.

::: Hell Beast :: Silence. Im giving the orders now. Im taking this ship 
under my control because I belive you are a Predacon defector on a Maximal 
Reconnisis mission. Dont move.

::: Set glanced at Jackle. THe tiny bot pointed a pistol to Set's head, where 
a tiny red dot targeted him between the eyes :::

::: Set ::: No need for this, Senator. We will cooperate with you entirely.

::: Secretly, he glanced over to Killer, sending a silent message to help him 
out. :::

::: Hell Beast ::: Take me to your bridge, I wish to review your computer 
data.

::: Set ::: hu...oh...We in the process of cleaning up the bridge from the 
crash-

::: Hell Beast ::: Enough of this! Your a traitor and I will prove it!

::: Set agian glances at Killer...but then realizes something. :::

::: Set ::: Alright, I'll admit why we are really here.

::: Hell Beast pushed Jackles pistol down ::: Excellent. Now we are getting 
somewhere.

::: Set ::: I am a Predacon Intelligence officer, as is Shuko. We were sent 
here to evaluate your progress and assist in any thing you may need for a 
brief stay.

::: Hell Beast ::: Proff?

::: Set ::: Ah....yes. Um, proff? we have the data the TriPredicus Council 
sent us about you and what we know about your so called Beast Wars.

::: Hell Beast ::: Then why didnt you contact us in the beggining?

::: Set ::: With the transwarp corridor still open and the asteriods...our 
communications were to disrupted to do anything.

::: Hell Beast ::: Really? What dose the golden disk mean? 

::: Set thought for a moment. He knew it was what Megatron stole...but he 
didnt know what was on it. :::

::: Hell Beast ::: Well?

::: Set ::: It means...

::: He knew it mut be important...:::

::: Set ::: Ah, It has important information on it....vital to your mission.

::: Hell Beast sat back. His red eyes went into slits :::

::: Hell Beast ::: Very good guess. Very well. I belive you for the moment. 
Although, I will be leaving a garrison behinde, for your help of course.

::: Set cursed under his breath. THis helpful garrison Hell Beast was going 
to leave wold be a group of spies. :::

::: Set ::: That is alright. We have numerous-

::: Hell Beast ::: I insist. Do you think its wise to question a Senator?

::: Set :: Not at all. Im just concerned for your safety. You need all the 
troops you have. It would be a waste to leave them here.

::: Hell Beast paused ::: Oh no. I do have a certian Predacon in mind who 
could help both of us greatly.

::: Set ::: Who would this be?

::: Hell Beast raised his hand holding an empty spark chamber. It was similar 
to Rampages. It had energon knifes that would stab the spark, to control the 
bot in question. :::

::: Hell Beast ::: The clone of a mad scientist, Transanulas. He will serve 
our needs.

::: Set nodded. At least he got him out of leaving a whole garrison behinde 
to spy on them. :::

~~~~~~~~~~

::: Megatron in his damaged form came to the ship. It was somewhat quiet now. 
He could see a Predacon symbol on the starboard side of the ship. With a bit 
of hope he buzzed to the open hatch and went inside. :::

::: Megatron ::: At last...I will have a new body and revenge!
